1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hayyah narrated:"I saw Ali performing Wudu. He washed his hands until he cleaned them, then he rinsed out his mouth three times, sniffed water into his nose and blew it out three times, washed his face three times, and his forearms three times. He wiped his head once, then he washed his feet up to the ankles. Then he stood up, taking what was left over from his purification (water) and drank it while he was standing. Then he said, 'I wanted to show you how Allah's Messenger purified himself

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي وُضُوءِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم كَيْفَ كَانَ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related] About The Wudu Of he Prophet: How Was It Performed?
